#summary gwt-jet showcase

= Introduction =

Here is a little showcase with cool examples for you to download.


= Details =

Requirements:

  * Maven 2.2.0 or later
  * GWT 2.2.0 or later (pom will try to configure 2.4.0, but it'll work with 2.2.0)


download from git-hub:
*git clone git://github.com/neokyol/gwt-jet-showcase.git*

or check Downloads page if you hate git
